(1). Invest in shatter-proof windows.
(2). Reinforce the doors so they can't be kicked in.
(3). Window bars for windows and weather doors. They do have some that look nice.
(4). Have decent outdoor lighting and locked fencing front and back yards.
(5). Get a security system with cameras and that monitors when windows and doors are opened.
(6). Get a ring door bell.
(7). Get a dog ,but not just any dog to maximize security a big dog is a better dog.
(8).  Invest in self defense. Take a few martial arts classes and own a few firearms.
(9). Have a safe room or shelter. Fallout shelters are cheap these days and can provide cover for tornadoes as well.
(10).  Live in a gated community or rural area.
